sentences.english: All participants must arrange their own personal accident insurance.
sentences.chinese: 參加者必需自行购买意外保险。

sentences.english: These reference books are necessary to us.
sentences.chinese: 这些参考书是我们所必需的。

sentences.english: You ought to get theirs lefts or interest into a contract.
sentences.chinese: 你们必需把她们的权益订在合同中。

sentences.english: Please record all the necessary information on a call slip.
sentences.chinese: 请在索书单上填上全部必需的情况。

sentences.english: The outbuildings are a must during your visit.
sentences.chinese: 室外是一个必需在您的莅临。

sentences.english: Redo logs are needed for recovery.
sentences.chinese: 对于恢复，重做日志是必需的。

sentences.english: The font tag has two required attributes and one optional one. They map directly to the three parameters in the java.awt.Font class
sentences.chinese: font标签有两个必需的属性和一个可选属性。

sentences.english: Heretofore unforeseen technical training therefore becomes a requirement in many projects.
sentences.chinese: 因此，技术培训是必需的。

sentences.english: Peope not only need the life necessities,but also comfortable life.
sentences.chinese: 人们不仅需要生活必需品，还想生活得舒适。

sentences.english: Miss Jin and I returned to our bedroom to take some sleeping necessities.
sentences.chinese: 于是我和靳兄一起回寝室拿一些露宿必需品。

sentences.english: They had few essential supplies, to begin with, so they had to improvise.
sentences.chinese: 开始时他们没有多少生活必需品，所以只好东拼西凑。

sentences.english: To be human is to be part of that conversation.
sentences.chinese: 若要为人，即必需加入对话。

sentences.english: Letwis do the pattern drill. You must respond asap.
sentences.chinese: 我们做句型练习，你们必需尽快做出反映。

sentences.english: If you would hit the mark, you must aim a little above it.
sentences.chinese: 要向射靶，必需瞄准比靶稍微高些。

sentences.english: Sometimes you've got to take one for the teare.
sentences.chinese: 有时为了团队你必需得亡故小我。

sentences.english: Original receipts must be presented before redemption at Neways Singapore Product Showcase.
sentences.chinese: 在领取赠品时必需附上收据。

definition: see 必不可少[bi4 bu4 ke3 shao3]
